definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Golden, with a very fine cordon of bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 金黃色的酒液，還有精緻的小氣泡。

sentences.english: A gold-yellow color with nose of white flowers and apricot note.
sentences.chinese: 亮麗的金黃色色澤，帶有白色花系銀杏的芳香。

sentences.english: The color gold is said to bring wealth, and the color red is considered especially lucky.
sentences.chinese: 金黃色象徵着財源廣進，紅色被認爲是特別吉利。

sentences.english: Heat up a skillet with some oil. Add in pine nuts and stir-fry until lightly golden.
sentences.chinese: 燒熱鍋入少許油，將松仁炒成金黃色，濾油。

sentences.english: All his attention was fixed on this golden prospect.
sentences.chinese: 他全神注視着這片金黃色的景色。

sentences.english: We looked at the tower the spire of which was golden.
sentences.chinese: 我們望着塔尖是金黃色的那座塔。

sentences.english: Conclusion The Yutian Kechuan capsule has certain of antibacterial effects on staphylococcus aureus.
sentences.chinese: 結論蝓天克喘膠囊對金黃色葡萄球菌有一定抗菌作用。

sentences.english: Have you ever noticed that all little children are blond?
sentences.chinese: 您有沒有注意到所有的小孩都是金黃色的頭髮？

sentences.english: The golden light of the lamps struck over the room.
sentences.chinese: 金黃色的燈光照在屋內。

sentences.english: Pale gold in color with a very fine mousse, the wine is aromatic on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 淡金黃色，似帶一抹慕司，此酒芬芳宜人。

sentences.english: Reheat oil, fry meat balls again till golden colour, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 再次熱油鍋，把肉球倒入炸至金黃色，撈起待用。

sentences.english: This wine is clear gold in colour with green tinges.
sentences.chinese: 清澈的金黃色中透出點綠。

sentences.english: The objective of this experiment was to extracted and purified capsular polysaccharide from Staphylococcus aureus, and detected its contents.
sentences.chinese: 爲提取純化金黃色葡萄球菌莢膜多糖並測定多糖含量。

sentences.english: The wine is a light golden yellow with lemony lights.
sentences.chinese: 此酒呈帶檸檬色澤的淡金黃色。

sentences.english: Low the coated banana pieces into the heated oil and deep fry them until golden in color.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢將它們放入燒熱的油鍋裏炸至金黃色。

sentences.english: The tremendous spaciousness of it was glowing with rich gold .
sentences.chinese: 蒼茫遼闊的景色染上了一片瑰麗濃豔的金黃色。

definition: to change color/to discolor/to change countenance/to become angry
